reviews.review_msg: Ben is awesome. I love that he publishes his lecture videos. Would definitely recommend taking this class.

I took Math 495 (there was no option but Math 360 is close enough) with Dr. Ben Ashby. He is a great professor, passionate about his subject, and encouraging to students. His homework and exams are very fair, if you study the notes and do the homework you will do well in his class. Always available in office hours and will help you.

My favourite professor so far. Amazing lectures, he records all his lectures and gives lots of examples and practice questions to help us learn. Also made a discord server for students to ask questions in and he will answer every question. Cares about individual learning progress, has sample exams and also loved the numerical aspect of the class :)
